esema jyothishayedi ga්rahayan dewiwarun washayen hadinwimak nokerana athara ema ga්rahayan niewidanaya karanu labana apala kalayen sahanaya sa`daha dewiyange pihita pathimak ha wenath punya katayuthu sidukaranu labimak pamanak sa`dahan karayii.udaharana lesa senasuru ga්rahaya wethin ashubha kalayak athayi niewidanaya karanu labana wita ema ashubhatha awamaya pinisa wishnu dewiyangen pihita pathima sidukaranu labayi.athamek mehidi mata senasuru apala nisa me ෙmi wath piliweth karanawa yayi pawasanne senasuru wetha wath piliweth itu kota sahanaya pathima nowana athara dewiyan wetha ha wenath punya katayuthu wala niratha wemin sahanayak pathimayi.athamek senasuru niewidana karanu labana apalaye dadi bawa nisama senasuru dewiyo yanu wenda hadunwana muth ehidi sathya washayenma siduwanne senasuru ga්rahayama apalaya athi karanu labana bawa sitha karana pa්rakashayak pamanaki.esema kathabahe pahasuwa pinisada mata senasuru apala athayi pawasathi.
